docs.title: Dotfiles Keybindings Documentation
docs.text: Welcome to the comprehensive keyboard shortcuts documentation for my personal development environment.

docs.title: Quick Navigation
docs.text:
• :material-keyboard: Neovim

    Text editor with LSP, Telescope, and custom plugins

    :octicons-arrow-right-24: View shortcuts

  • :material-console: tmux

    Terminal multiplexer with vim-style navigation

    :octicons-arrow-right-24: View shortcuts

  • :material-window-maximize: AeroSpace

    i3-like window manager for macOS

    :octicons-arrow-right-24: View shortcuts

  • :material-folder: yazi

    Terminal file manager with DuckDB integration

    :octicons-arrow-right-24: View shortcuts

  • :material-cursor-default: Cursor

    AI-powered IDE with Vim mode

    :octicons-arrow-right-24: View shortcuts

  • :material-vim: IdeaVim

    IntelliJ IDEA Vim emulation

    :octicons-arrow-right-24: View shortcuts

  • :material-terminal: zsh

    Shell configuration with vi mode

    :octicons-arrow-right-24: View shortcuts

docs.title: Shared Patterns
docs.text:
All tools follow consistent keybinding patterns:

Pattern Keys Purpose Leader Key Space Primary command prefix (Neovim, IdeaVim, Cursor) Window Navigation Ctrl+H Ctrl+J Ctrl+K Ctrl+L Vim-style directional movement Search Operations Space+S+* Telescope-style search (files, grep, symbols) LSP Actions Space+G+* Go to definition/references/implementation Refactoring Space+R+* Rename, extract, refactor operations

docs.title: Quick Reference
docs.text: Looking for a specific shortcut? Check the Quick Reference page for cross-tool comparisons.

docs.title: About This Documentation
docs.text:
This site is automatically generated from dotfiles configurations and deployed via GitHub Actions.

  • Repository: czechue/.dotfiles
  • Last Updated: Auto-updated on each push to master
  • Tools: MkDocs Material, List.js, GitHub Actions

docs.title: About
docs.text: This documentation site provides a comprehensive reference for all keyboard shortcuts across my personal dotfiles configuration.

docs.title: Tools Documented
docs.text:
• Neovim: Text editor based on Kickstart.nvim with lazy.nvim plugin manager
  • tmux: Terminal multiplexer with vim-style navigation
  • AeroSpace: i3-like tiling window manager for macOS
  • yazi: Terminal file manager with DuckDB plugin
  • Cursor: AI-powered IDE with Vim mode
  • IdeaVim: Vim emulation for IntelliJ IDEA
  • zsh: Shell with vi mode and custom functions

docs.title: Technology Stack
docs.text:
• MkDocs Material: Documentation framework
  • pymdownx.keys: Keyboard shortcut rendering
  • List.js: Interactive table search and filtering
  • GitHub Actions: Automated deployment

docs.title: Deployment
docs.text: This documentation is automatically deployed to GitHub Pages when changes are pushed to the master branch.

docs.title: Deployment Process
docs.text:
1. Push changes to master branch
  2. GitHub Actions workflow triggers (.github/workflows/docs.yml)
  3. Workflow installs Python and MkDocs Material
  4. Site builds with mkdocs build --strict
  5. Deploys to gh-pages branch with mkdocs gh-deploy
  6. GitHub Pages serves the site at https://czechue.github.io/.dotfiles/

docs.title: Manual Deployment
docs.text:
You can also deploy manually from your local machine:

# Install dependencies
pip install -r requirements.txt

# Build and deploy
mkdocs gh-deploy

docs.title: GitHub Pages Settings
docs.text: In the repository settings, GitHub Pages should be configured to: - Source: Deploy from gh-pages branch - Folder: / (root) - Custom domain: None (using default GitHub Pages URL)

docs.title: Repository Structure
docs.text:
.dotfiles/
├── docs/              # Documentation source (this site)
├── nvim/             # Neovim configuration
├── tmux/             # tmux configuration
├── aerospace/        # AeroSpace configuration
├── yazi/             # yazi configuration
├── cursor/           # Cursor IDE settings
├── ideavim/          # IdeaVim configuration
└── zsh/              # zsh configuration

docs.title: Updating Documentation
docs.text:
Documentation is maintained manually and can be updated by:

  1. Editing Markdown files in docs/ directory
  2. Running mkdocs serve to preview locally
  3. Committing changes to master branch
  4. GitHub Actions automatically deploys to GitHub Pages

docs.title: License
docs.text: Personal dotfiles repository. Configuration patterns may be freely adapted for personal use.

docs.title: Contact
docs.text:
• GitHub: @czechue
  • Repository: czechue/.dotfiles

docs.title: Quick Reference
docs.text: Unified view of keyboard shortcuts across all tools with cross-tool comparisons.

docs.title: Window Navigation (Ctrl+HJKL)
docs.text:
Available in: Neovim, tmux (with prefix), AeroSpace (Ctrl+Alt+HJKL), Cursor, IdeaVim

Tool Left Down Up Right Notes Neovim Ctrl+H Ctrl+J Ctrl+K Ctrl+L Direct navigation tmux Ctrl+B+H Ctrl+B+J Ctrl+B+K Ctrl+B+L Requires prefix AeroSpace Ctrl+Alt+H Ctrl+Alt+J Ctrl+Alt+K Ctrl+Alt+L System-wide Cursor Ctrl+H Ctrl+J Ctrl+K Ctrl+L Vim mode IdeaVim Ctrl+H Ctrl+J Ctrl+K Ctrl+L Vim emulation

docs.title: Search Operations (Leader+S+*)
docs.text:
Available in: Neovim, Cursor, IdeaVim

Action Neovim Cursor IdeaVim Find Files Space+S+F Space+S+F Space+S+F Grep/Search Space+S+G Space+S+G Space+S+G Symbols Space+S+H Space+S+S Space+S+S Recent Files Space+S+R Space+S+R Space+S+R

docs.title: LSP Actions (Leader+G+*)
docs.text:
Available in: Neovim, Cursor, IdeaVim

Action Neovim Cursor IdeaVim Go to Definition G+D Space+G+D Space+G+D Go to References G+R - - Go to Implementation G+Shift+I Space+G+I Space+G+I Rename Space+R+N Space+R+N Space+R+N Code Action Space+C+A Space+C+A Space+C+A

docs.title: Project Switching
docs.text: Tool Shortcut Action Neovim Ctrl+F tmux-sessionizer tmux Ctrl+F tmux-sessionizer (no prefix) zsh Ctrl+F tmux-sessionizer yazi Z fzf directory jump yazi Shift+Z zoxide directory jump

docs.title: File Management
docs.text: Tool Open Copy Paste Delete Rename yazi O Y P D R Neovim Space+S+F - - - Space+R+N

docs.title: Git Operations
docs.text: Tool Shortcut Action Neovim Space+G+G LazyGit tmux Ctrl+B+Shift+G LazyGit popup Neovim Space+G+W+S Git worktree switch Neovim Space+G+W+C Git worktree create

docs.title: AeroSpace Modes
docs.text: Mode Enter Exit Purpose Resize Alt+R Esc Resize windows Service Alt+Shift+; Esc Reload config

docs.title: Vim Modes (Neovim, Cursor, IdeaVim)
docs.text: Mode Enter Purpose Normal Esc Command mode Insert I Text editing Visual V Selection Visual Line Shift+V Line selection

docs.title: All Shortcuts Search
docs.text:
Use the search box below to find shortcuts across all tools:

Shortcut Action Tool Context Ctrl+H Navigate left Neovim Window Navigation Ctrl+H Navigate left Cursor Window Navigation Ctrl+H Navigate left IdeaVim Window Navigation Ctrl+B+H Select pane left tmux Pane Navigation Ctrl+Alt+H Focus left AeroSpace Window Focus H Parent directory yazi Navigation Space+S+F Search files Neovim Telescope Space+S+F Quick open Cursor Search Space+S+F Go to file IdeaVim Search Space+G+G LazyGit Neovim Git Ctrl+B+Shift+G LazyGit popup tmux Git Ctrl+F tmux-sessionizer Multiple Project Switching Alt+1 through Alt+9 Switch workspace AeroSpace Workspace 1 through 9 Switch tab yazi Tabs Space+A Add to Harpoon Neovim File Management Space+H Harpoon menu Neovim File Management G+D Go to definition Neovim LSP Space+G+D Go to definition Cursor/IdeaVim LSP Space+R+N Rename Multiple LSP Space+C+A Code action Multiple LSP

docs.title: Tips
docs.text:
• Leader Key: Most Vim-style tools use Space as the leader
  • Prefix Key: tmux uses Ctrl+B as the prefix for all commands
  • System-Wide: AeroSpace keybindings work across all applications
  • Context-Aware: Some shortcuts behave differently in different modes

docs.title: AeroSpace
docs.text:
i3-like tiling window manager for macOS with multiple modes (main, service, resize).

Configuration: aerospace/.config/aerospace/aerospace.toml

docs.title: Layout Management
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Alt+/ Toggle layout (tiles horizontal/vertical) Layout Alt+, Toggle accordion layout Layout

docs.title: Focus Navigation
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Ctrl+Alt+H Focus window left Window Focus Ctrl+Alt+J Focus window down Window Focus Ctrl+Alt+K Focus window up Window Focus Ctrl+Alt+L Focus window right Window Focus

docs.title: Move Windows
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Ctrl+Alt+Shift+H Move window left Window Movement Ctrl+Alt+Shift+J Move window down Window Movement Ctrl+Alt+Shift+K Move window up Window Movement Ctrl+Alt+Shift+L Move window right Window Movement

docs.title: Workspace Navigation
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Alt+1 Switch to workspace 1 Workspace Alt+2 Switch to workspace 2 Workspace Alt+3 Switch to workspace 3 Workspace Alt+4 Switch to workspace 4 Workspace Alt+5 Switch to workspace 5 Workspace Alt+6 Switch to workspace 6 Workspace Alt+7 Switch to workspace 7 Workspace Alt+8 Switch to workspace 8 Workspace Alt+9 Switch to workspace 9 Workspace

docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Alt+Shift+1 Move window to workspace 1 Window Movement Alt+Shift+2 Move window to workspace 2 Window Movement Alt+Shift+3 Move window to workspace 3 Window Movement Alt+Shift+4 Move window to workspace 4 Window Movement Alt+Shift+5 Move window to workspace 5 Window Movement Alt+Shift+6 Move window to workspace 6 Window Movement Alt+Shift+7 Move window to workspace 7 Window Movement Alt+Shift+8 Move window to workspace 8 Window Movement Alt+Shift+9 Move window to workspace 9 Window Movement

docs.title: Modes
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Alt+R Enter resize mode Mode Switch Alt+Shift+; Enter service mode Mode Switch

docs.title: Resize Mode
docs.text:
After pressing Alt+R:

Shortcut Action Context H Decrease width Resize J Increase height Resize K Decrease height Resize L Increase width Resize Esc Exit resize mode Mode

docs.title: Service Mode
docs.text:
After pressing Alt+Shift+;:

Shortcut Action Context R Reload config Service Esc Exit service mode Mode

docs.title: Cursor
docs.text:
AI-powered IDE based on VS Code with Vim mode and custom keybindings.

Configuration: cursor/keybindings.json, cursor/settings.json

docs.title: AI Features
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Cmd+I Open composer mode AI Cmd+K Inline AI edit AI Cmd+Shift+L Open AI chat AI

docs.title: Editor
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Ctrl+E Toggle explorer sidebar Editor Shift+Space Trigger suggestions Editor Cmd+1 Toggle sidebar visibility Editor Cmd+Right Accept inline suggestion word Editor

docs.title: Vim Mode - Window Navigation
docs.text:
Leader key: Space

Shortcut Action Context Ctrl+H Navigate to left editor group Window Navigation Ctrl+J Navigate to lower editor group Window Navigation Ctrl+K Navigate to upper editor group Window Navigation Ctrl+L Navigate to right editor group Window Navigation

docs.title: Vim Mode - Window Management
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Space+W+V Split editor vertically Window Space+W+H Split editor horizontally Window Space+W+W Close editor Window Space+W+A Close all editors Window

docs.title: Vim Mode - Search
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Space+S+F Quick open (find files) Search Space+S+G Find in files Search Space+S+S Go to symbol Search Space+S+A Show all commands Search Space+S+R Show recent files Search

docs.title: Vim Mode - LSP
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Space+G+D Go to definition LSP Space+G+Y Go to type definition LSP Space+G+I Go to implementation LSP Space+R+N Rename symbol LSP

docs.title: Vim Mode - Code Actions
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Space+C+A Show code actions Code Actions Space+R+M Extract to method Refactoring Space+R+V Extract to variable Refactoring

docs.title: Vim Mode - Multiple Cursors
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Ctrl+G Add next occurrence Multiple Cursors Space+Ctrl+G Add all occurrences Multiple Cursors

docs.title: Vim Mode - Visual Mode
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Shift+J Move line down Visual Mode Shift+K Move line up Visual Mode

docs.title: IdeaVim
docs.text:
Vim emulation plugin for IntelliJ IDEA with custom keybindings matching Neovim patterns.

Configuration: ideavim/.ideavimrc Leader Key: Space

docs.title: Window Navigation
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Ctrl+H Move to left window Window Navigation Ctrl+J Move to lower window Window Navigation Ctrl+K Move to upper window Window Navigation Ctrl+L Move to right window Window Navigation

docs.title: Window Management
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Space+W+V Split vertically Window Space+W+H Split horizontally Window Space+W+W Unsplit (close split) Window Space+W+A Unsplit all Window

docs.title: Search/Navigation
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Space+S+F Go to file Search Space+S+G Find in path Search Space+S+S Go to symbol Search Space+S+A Go to action Search Space+S+D Show error description Search Space+S+R Recent files Search

docs.title: LSP/Navigation
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Space+G+D Go to declaration LSP Space+G+Y Go to type declaration LSP Space+G+I Go to implementation LSP Space+G+T Go to test LSP Space+R+N Rename element LSP

docs.title: Code Actions
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Space+C+A Show intention actions (code actions) Code Actions Space+S+W Surround with Code Actions Shift+Space Generate menu Code Actions Space+R+M Extract method Refactoring Space+R+V Introduce variable Refactoring Space+R+F Introduce field Refactoring

docs.title: Multiple Cursors
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Ctrl+G Select next occurrence Multiple Cursors Space+Ctrl+G Select all occurrences Multiple Cursors Alt+J Add selection on next occurrence Multiple Cursors Alt+Shift+J Unselect occurrence Multiple Cursors

docs.title: File Operations
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Space+Q+Q Close content File Space+Q+A Close all editors File

docs.title: Neovim
docs.text:
Neovim configuration based on Kickstart.nvim with lazy.nvim plugin manager, LSP integration, Telescope fuzzy finder, and custom plugins.

Configuration: nvim/.config/nvim/init.lua

docs.title: Core Navigation
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Ctrl+H Move focus to left window Window Navigation Ctrl+J Move focus to lower window Window Navigation Ctrl+K Move focus to upper window Window Navigation Ctrl+L Move focus to right window Window Navigation Shift+J Move line down Visual Mode Shift+K Move line up Visual Mode Esc Clear search highlighting Normal Mode

docs.title: Telescope (Search)
docs.text:
Leader key: Space

Shortcut Action Context Space+S+F Search files Fuzzy Finder Space+S+G Live grep Fuzzy Finder Space+S+H Search help tags Fuzzy Finder Space+S+D Search diagnostics Fuzzy Finder Space+S+R Resume last search Fuzzy Finder Space+S+N Search Neovim files Fuzzy Finder Space+S+W Search current word Fuzzy Finder Space+/ Search in current buffer Fuzzy Finder

docs.title: LSP (Language Server)
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context G+D Go to definition LSP G+R Go to references LSP G+Shift+I Go to implementation LSP G+Shift+D Go to type definition LSP Space+R+N Rename symbol LSP Space+C+A Code action LSP Space+O+I Organize imports LSP Shift+K Hover documentation LSP

docs.title: tmux
docs.text:
Terminal multiplexer with vim-style navigation and custom keybindings.

Configuration: tmux/.tmux.conf Prefix Key: Ctrl+B

docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Ctrl+F Open tmux-sessionizer Project Switching (no prefix) Ctrl+B+R Reload tmux config Configuration

docs.title: Pane Navigation
docs.text:
All commands require prefix (Ctrl+B) first:

Shortcut Action Context Ctrl+B+H Select pane left Pane Navigation Ctrl+B+J Select pane down Pane Navigation Ctrl+B+K Select pane up Pane Navigation Ctrl+B+L Select pane right Pane Navigation

docs.title: Window Management
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Ctrl+B+C Create new window in current directory Window Ctrl+B+" Split window vertically in current directory Window Ctrl+B"%"++ Split window horizontally in current directory Window

docs.text: Shortcut Action Context Ctrl+B+Shift+G Open lazygit popup Git

docs.title: yazi

Terminal file manager with vim-style navigation and DuckDB plugin for CSV preview.

Configuration: yazi/keymap.toml

docs.title: Navigation
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context K Previous file Navigation J Next file Navigation H Parent directory Navigation L Enter directory Navigation Shift+H Back in history Navigation Shift+L Forward in history Navigation G+G Go to top Navigation Shift+G Go to bottom Navigation

docs.title: File Operations
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context O Open selected files File Operations Y Yank (copy) files File Operations P Paste files File Operations D Trash selected files File Operations A Create file File Operations R Rename file File Operations

docs.title: Search & Filter
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context S Search files by name (fd) Search Shift+S Search files by content (ripgrep) Search Z Jump to directory (fzf) Search Shift+Z Jump to directory (zoxide) Search F Filter files Filter / Find next file Find

docs.title: Copy Operations
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context C+C Copy file path Clipboard C+D Copy directory path Clipboard C+F Copy filename Clipboard

docs.title: Sorting
docs.text: Shortcut Action Context ,+M Sort by modified time Sorting ,+Shift+M Sort by modified time (reverse) Sorting ,+N Sort by natural order Sorting

Built-in fzf keybindings (loaded via source <(fzf --zsh)):

Vi mode enabled via zsh-vi-mode plugin:

Shortcut Action Context Esc Enter normal mode Vi Mode I Enter insert mode Vi Mode (from normal) V Edit command in editor Vi Mode (normal)
